body:
Hi Rania,

Of course i remember :-)

The way i update is practically the same i saw you did in the file. But i ask to update the file instead all components. For all components i go the github, download the HB/LB.zip and replace in the UserObjects folder (manually). I know that using the update component can do the same, but i don't mind going there and see/read what components got updated lately.

As for your file, i didn't understand if it works or it didn't. As i said, i updated the file and changed the resolutions to low quality, ab 2 and size 240. It works for me.

-A.
